name: AAAA
description:
Get lost in this world of strange creatures and dark entity's. You have a purpose, but its not entirely clear what that is. Is that ok with you?
P.S. My first release with actual music I made. Haha. Let me know what you think!

Linux, Windows and Mac (maybe IOS) will be released SOON!!! Until then it looks like all the robots get a head start. [0 0]❤

Made with:
  • Godot engine
  • Ardour
  • GIMP
  • Krita
